If I have lets say 10 contacts in my addressbook with last name "Smith" and I compose a new message and start to type "Smith" in the addressbar, I only get displayed 4 of my 10 contacts for "Smith" via autocompletion.
But maybe that "Smith" I want to right an e-mail to is not shown then :-(

Therefore my suggestion for autocompletion (RFE):
Show ALL matches for "Smith" instead of only 4 of them.

Reproducible: Always

You are right.
I need to specify my RFE more precisely:
- There's no option/pref to customize the length of the visible autocompletion drop down list (before the scroll bar occurs).
- Especially there's no option/pref to set it to unlimited (= show all matches at once in the drop down list w/o scroll bar).
